channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description: so i am hosting a 317 server for my friend. when he was hosting it i could log in no problem. now im hosting it and everyone can connect and log in except me, it loads up to the log in then when u type in any username and password i get "error connecting to server." if anyone has had this problem or knows how to fix it please help me.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @godz3rdnut69 godz3rdnut69
item.description:
@godz3rdnut69 wrote:

so i am hosting a 317 server for my friend. when he was hosting it i could log in no problem.
now im hosting it and everyone can connect and log in except me, it loads up to the log in then when u type in any username and password i get “error connecting to server.” if anyone has had this problem or knows how to fix it please help me.
